name: Pokémon Zero Negative
overview: A few months after RED completed his KANTO POKéDEX, a new species of POKéMON was discovered by PROF.SAM, OAK's old friend. It is believed to be the cause of RED's silent behavior and sudden disappearance... Moving to KANTO, you were asked to investigate this POKéMON's last whereabouts. Having RED as an idol figure and a hero, you were inclined to help in his search and possible recovery... Features: • New Starters are lv25, Charmeleon, Raichu, and Lapras • Small changes to the map • Fakemon • New Story • Higher than average difficulty
